languages.text: "Если бы ты, Инцендия, заявилась в гости ко мне, я бы тоже не тратил время на теплые приветствия, а немедленно вооружился огнеметом, пока твои святоши-паразиты не наводнили весь дворец".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы ты, Инцендия, заявилась в гости ко мне, я бы тоже не тратил время на теплые приветствия, а немедленно вооружился огнеметом, пока твои святоши-паразиты не наводнили весь дворец".

languages.text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты, Инцендия, заявилась в гости ко мне, я бы тоже не тратил время на теплые приветствия, а немедленно вооружился огнеметом, пока твои святоши-паразиты не наводнили весь дворец".

traits.locale_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I would not waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

"If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I would not waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

"If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

languages.text: 「インセンディア、お前が俺のところに来ても、時間を割いて互いに心のこもったあいさつなどしない、絶対にだ。お前の中に巣食う自己中な寄生虫が俺の宮殿全域にはびこる前に、さっさとフレイマーを装備してやる」
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: 「インセンディア、お前が俺のところに来ても、時間を割いて互いに心のこもったあいさつなどしない、絶対にだ。お前の中に巣食う自己中な寄生虫が俺の宮殿全域にはびこる前に、さっさとフレイマーを装備してやる」

languages.text: “因森蒂娅，如果是我负责招待你，我才懒得和你打招呼。我会立刻掏出火焰喷射器，赶在你手下那群自以为是的寄生虫爬满我的宫殿之前，把他们烧得一干二净。”
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: “因森蒂娅，如果是我负责招待你，我才懒得和你打招呼。我会立刻掏出火焰喷射器，赶在你手下那群自以为是的寄生虫爬满我的宫殿之前，把他们烧得一干二净。”

languages.text: «Incendia, si fuera usted quien viniera a verme tampoco perdería el tiempo con cálidos saludos. En vez de eso, me armaría con un lanzallamas para evitar que sus mojigatos parásitos infestaran mi palacio».
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: «Incendia, si fuera usted quien viniera a verme tampoco perdería el tiempo con cálidos saludos. En vez de eso, me armaría con un lanzallamas para evitar que sus mojigatos parásitos infestaran mi palacio».

languages.text: « Si vous me rendiez visite, Incendia, mon accueil serait loin d'être aussi chaleureux. Je préférerais réduire mon palais en cendres avec un lance-flammes plutôt que de le voir infesté de parasites moralisateurs. »
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous me rendiez visite, Incendia, mon accueil serait loin d'être aussi chaleureux. Je préférerais réduire mon palais en cendres avec un lance-flammes plutôt que de le voir infesté de parasites moralisateurs. »

languages.text: "Incendia, würdet Ihr mir einen Besuch abstatten, würde ich auch keine Zeit für eine warme Begrüßung verschwenden. Stattdessen würde ich mich mit einem Flammenwerfer bewaffnen, bevor Eure selbstgerechten Parasiten meinen ganzen Palast infizieren könnten."
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: "Incendia, würdet Ihr mir einen Besuch abstatten, würde ich auch keine Zeit für eine warme Begrüßung verschwenden. Stattdessen würde ich mich mit einem Flammenwerfer bewaffnen, bevor Eure selbstgerechten Parasiten meinen ganzen Palast infizieren könnten."

languages.text: "Ziyaretime gelsen ben de sıcak karşılamayla zaman kaybetmezdim İncendia. Kendini beğenmiş asalakların sarayımı istila etmeden hemen elime bir alevsaçan alırdım."
languages.original_text: "If you, Incendia, were to pay me a visit, I wouldn't waste time on warm greetings either. No, I would promptly arm myself with a flamer before your self-righteous parasites could infest my entire palace."

traits.locale_text: "Ziyaret etsen ben de sıcak karşılamayla zaman kaybetmezdim İncendia. Kendini beğenmiş asalakların sarayımı istila etmeden önce elime hemen bir alev silahı alırdım."
